description.p: Learn the secrets of the multiverse. You part the veils of space, time, and consciousnessâ€”mastering spells of discernment, remote viewing, supernatural knowledge, and foresight.
When you choose this subclass at 3rd level, you gain the following features.
Choose two Wizard spells from the Divination school, each no higher than level 2, and add them to your spellbook for free.

In addition, whenever you gain access to a new level of spell slots in this class, you can add one Wizard spell from the Divination school to your spellbook for free. The chosen spell must be of a level for which you have spell slots.

Glimpses of the future begin to press on your awareness. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, roll two d20s and record the numbers rolled. You can replace any D20 Test made by you or a creature that you can see with one of these foretelling rolls. You must choose to do so before the roll, and you can replace a roll in this way only once per turn.
Each foretelling roll can be used only once. When you finish a Long Rest, you lose any unused foretelling rolls.

sheet.description: After a Long Rest, roll two d20s and record them. Once per turn, you can expend a die and replace any d20 Test made by you or a creature you see with its results. Each die is usable once; any unused dice are lost at your next Long Rest.

After a Long Rest, roll three d20s and record them. Once per turn, you can expend a die and replace any d20 Test made by you or a creature you see with its results. Each die is usable once; any unused dice are lost at your next Long Rest.

description.p: Casting Divination spells comes so easily that it expends only a fraction of your efforts. When you cast a Divination spell using a level 2+ spell slot, you regain one expended spell slot. The slot you regain must be of a level lower than the slot you expended and can't be higher than level 5.

sheet.description: When you cast a Divination spell with a slot of level 2+, regain one expended slot of a lower level (max 5th).

description.p: You can increase your powers of perception. As a Bonus Action, choose one of the following benefits, which lasts until you start a Short or Long Rest. You can't use this feature again until you finish a Short or Long Rest.

ul.li: Darkvision. You gain Darkvision with a range of 120 feet.
Greater Comprehension. You can read any language.
See Invisibility. You can cast See Invisibility without expending a spell slot.

description.p: Your Portent grows in power. When you use Portent after a Long Rest, you roll three d20s instead of two.
